943530.name: Fantasy Grounds - Quests of Doom 4: Pictures at an Exhibition (5E)
943530.description:
Quests of Doom 4: Pictures at an Exhibition

by
Dennis Sustare
Pictures at an Exhibition is an adventure for parties of 4-6 characters of levels 4-6.
During the adventure, players control characters on an exotic cruise in a parallel reality known as "the Real World".
During a stopover, they find themselves on a museum tour where the vivid paintings draw them into a world of fantasy.
These excursions involve fighting and puzzle solving to survive. The adventure originally was written for play at NTRPGCon 2012.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Charles Surette
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
